data.name: DriverPropertyInfo
desc: describes the driver properties for making a connection.
The DriverPropertyInfo is of interest only to advanced programmers who need to interact with a driver to discover and supply properties for connections.

items.name: Choices
lines: contains a sequence of possible values if the value for the field DriverPropertyInfo.value may be selected from a particular set of values; otherwise empty.

items.name: Description
lines: is a brief description of the property, which may be null.

items.name: IsRequired
lines: is TRUE if a value must be supplied for this property during Driver.connect and FALSE otherwise.

items.name: Name
lines: is the name of the property.

items.name: Value
lines: specifies the current value of the property, based on the driver-supplied default values.
This field may be empty if no value is known.
